channel.title: Invisible
channel.description: Can someone give me a tut or something so i can be invisible and move around to spy on rule breakers?

item.title: Invisible
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Yes. What Source You Using?[br][size=1]Posted on: March 02, 2007, 01:44:16 PM[/size][hr]If Using Testscape:

if (command.startsWith("byebye") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOURNAMEHERE")) { sendMessage("Other players can no longer see you, type ::show to reverse this command."); pHead=-100; pBeard=-100; pTorso=-100; pArms=-100; pHands=-100; pLegs=-100; pFeet=-100; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } if (command.startsWith("peekaboo") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOURNAMEHERE")) { sendMessage("Other players can now see you once again, type ::hide to reverse this command."); pHead=3; pBeard=19; pTorso=19; pArms=29; pHands=35; pLegs=39; pFeet=44; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

Type: ::byebye - To Go Invisable.
Type: ::peekaboo - To Show Your Self Again

Read full topic
